name: Mods Mod
desc: This mod allows compatibility between different mods that override PBS files. These mods should be defined as subfolders of the `Mods` folder in the main game folder and each mod should define their own PBS files with similar naming conventions (e.g. `pokemon.txt`, `moves.txt`, etc.)

name: Grass Lag Fix
short-desc: Removes the lag caused by grass in the game.
desc: The mod removes the grass rustle animation, which ultimately causes a lot of lag issues in the game.

name: Call Chansey Mod
short-desc: Adds an option to heal from the menu.
desc: Adds an option to call Chansey from the main game menu. When pressed, Chansey will magically heal your team from anywhere.

name: Call Xatu Mod
short-desc: Adds an option to teleport from the menu.
desc: Adds an option to call Xatu from the main game menu. When pressed, Xatu will show you the current map and you can teleport to any place where you have talked to their Church of Isaiah member.

name: Remote PC Mod
short-desc: Adds an option to open the PC from the menu.
desc: Adds an option to open the PC remotely from the menu regardless of where you are in the map.

name: PC Utils
desc: Core mod for mods that want to add extra functionalities to the PC Storage System.

name: Party Utils
desc: Core mod for mods that want to add extra functionalities to the Pokemon party screen.

name: Change PokeBall
desc: Adds an option in the party menu to change your Pokemon's PokeBall.

name: Change Hidden Power
short-desc: Change your Pokemon's Hidden Power type.
desc: Adds an option in the party menu to change your Pokemon's Hidden Power type.

name: frens
desc: Adds an option in the party menu to change your Pokemon's Happiness.

name: Sort PC
desc: Adds the option to sort your boxes in the PC menu. The mod lets you sort by name, dex number, stats or base stats in descending order. The mod will sort the first 39 boxes in your PC (i.e. the last box will not be sorted).

name: Find PC
short-desc: Finds Pokemon or Items in your PC.
desc: Adds the option to find Pokemon or Items in your PC. Pokemon can be searched by species name or by nickname, and it allows searching for eggs as well.

name: Release Box
short-desc: Bulk releases an entire box in your PC.
desc: Adds the option to bulk release all Pokemon in one of your boxes in your PC. The mod asks for confirmation in case you use it by mistake.

name: Swap Boxes
short-desc: Swaps two boxes in your PC.
desc: Adds the option to swap two boxes in your PC. The background and box names are also swapped.

name: Photosensitity Mod
short-desc: Helps players that struggle with photosensitivity.
desc: Currently, the mod only removes the two flashes that appear just right before every battle. Please contact gotheru on Discord if you have more suggestions for this mod.

name: Magnet(ic) Lure
desc: If the first Pokemon in your party holds a Magnet, the mod will filter out Pokemon species that you have already caught from wild random encounters. If you want this mod to be active at all times rather thank just when the first Pokemon holds a Magnet, remove the `pbShouldFilterKnownPkmnFromEncounter?` chunk and add `pbShouldFilterKnownPkmnFromEncounter?; true; end`

name: Shiny Gummies
short-desc: Adds Shiny Gummies to the game.
desc: If the first Pokemon in your party holds a one of the new IV gummies, then it will filter out Pokemon from a different species from wild random encounters. That way, you can battle the same Pokemon over and over for your shiny hunts!

name: Exponential Exp. Gains
desc: After defeating a Pokemon in a battle, your Pokemon will gain an extra amount of exp. points equivalent to 10% of the exp. points needed to reach the level cap.

name: Guaranteed Catch
desc: The mod makes all PokeBalls have a guaranteed chance to catch the opposing Pokemon, no matter the foe's HP or status (just like a Master Ball!)

name: Money Bags
desc: This mod multiples the money gained in battles by 5.

name: Auto Pickup
short-desc: Stores automatically items gained during a battle.
desc: This mod stores automatically items gained during a battle (Avarice, Thief, etc.) or picked up by Pickup or Honey Gather after the battle.

name: Low Resolution Weather
desc: Disables the weather particles that cause lag in some systems.

name: Fast Eggs
desc: Makes waiting for eggs in the Day Care four times faster.
